column5: I have been asked to inform you after receiving the message Thursday evening  Mr Rolf Balansiak of Wishmaster Big Baits has passed away My deepest sympathies
My condolences to his family and friends.
My condolences to his family and friends.  John
That's too bad, I wish his family the best. He made some of the best baits ever, those things are amazing, almost to pretty to actually fish with.
very sad to hear RIP and my thoughts and prayers to his family

Wow sad news, I remember meeting him when he first started selling his baits he was offering them at a Muskies Canada meeting for 35 and 45 dollars. I only bought two. Wish I would have bought more cause there price went through the roof.
condolences to his family and friends
Details regarding visitation/service are posted below in this thread.

There has been a change in plans regarding visitation and funeral service as of 1:00 pm Sunday.  There will be NO VISITATION ON MONDAY Jan. 21  Instead, visitation will take place Tues., Jan 22 from noon to 1 pm. at the funeral home with a celebration of Rolf's life to follow after at that location.  The funeral home can be accessed at www.donaldvbrown.ca ; this information will appear on that site in an updated obituary notice. Directions to the funeral home are available at that site. This information is also available at the Wishmaster site:- http://www.wishmasterbigbaits.com/  Please share this information with others.
